name: Fruit Cannons
description:
Fruit Cannons is a 1 vs 1 based shooting game, where you get a chance to fight your opponent with fruits. Are you a person who prefers to strategize your moves or maybe you want to have a chaotic battle? You have an absolute freedom of choice when it comes to the gameplay. The only goal you have is destroying your enemies’s cannon. In order to do that feel free to use all the different ammo types Fruit Cannons provides you with and of course do not forget to avoid incoming shots. The best of 3 system helps you and your friend to find out who is the best monkey-shooter in the game. Do you want to feel yourself unique? Create your own monkey with the customisation menu and become a legend everyone talks about. What are you waiting for?! Load your cannon with a fruit and let the battle begin!

THE TEAM

Bogdan Serov - Product Owner

Arushi David Audimulapu - Scrum Master

Willy Pettersson -  Programmer

Cody Cernohous - Artist / Construction

Simon Leijnegard - Artist
